endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all repositories available within the service.
Create a new repository to manage version-controlled content.
Fetch details of a specific repository by its unique identifier.
Update configuration or metadata of the specified repository.
Remove a repository permanently from the service.
List all branches associated with a particular repository.
Create a new branch within a specified repository.
Retrieve commit history for a repository.
Merge changes from one branch to another within a repository.
Set or modify user permissions for accessing a specific repository.
